title: 1. Form Title
tooltip: Clearly states the purpose of the form.
novaThought: A good title sets the right expectation. Users scan this first to confirm they're in the right place.

title: 2. Form Description
novaThought: The description is your emotional anchor - it reassures users they'll get the help they need.

title: 3. Issue Type
tooltip: Categorizes the problem for faster routing.
novaThought: I use this field to route your request to the right specialist team. Choose accurately for fastest support!

title: 4. Detailed Description
tooltip: Provide as much detail as possible here.
novaThought: The more specific details you provide here, the faster we can isolate and solve your issue. Think of it as giving me the puzzle pieces to help you.

title: 5. Nova's Note
tooltip: A helpful, context-aware tip from me to you!
novaThought: I analyze patterns across user feedback to provide personalized suggestions that might help resolve common issues before submission.

title: 6. Game Select
tooltip: Specify which game your issue is related to.
novaThought: Each game has its own dedicated support team with specialized knowledge of that particular title.

title: 7. Preferred Email
tooltip: Where you'll receive updates about your ticket.
novaThought: I'll use this to send you personalized status updates and follow-ups. Your data is always handled securely.

title: 8. Attachment
tooltip: Upload screenshots or videos to provide more context.
novaThought: Visual context helps tremendously! A screenshot often communicates what might take paragraphs to describe.

title: 9. CAPTCHA
tooltip: A quick check to ensure you're human.
novaThought: While I love my AI friends, this helps keep spam bots from overwhelming our support system so humans get faster help.

title: 10. Submit Button
tooltip: Sends your completed form to the support team.
novaThought: Once submitted, I'll automatically analyze your request to identify potential solutions before a human review.
